get.description: Get all namespaces.<br>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Required permission</i>: resource=<b>"ADMIN:NAMESPACE"</b>, action=2 <b>(READ)</b></li><li><i>Action code</i>: 11303</li><li><i>Returns</i>: list of namespaces</li></ul>

post.description: Create a namespace.<br>By default the namespace is enabled.<br>In multi tenant mode, parentNamespace will be automatically filled with requester namespace if the requester is using studio or publisher token, and it will be filled with studio namespace if the requester uses game token. An oauth client will also be created and the id will be returned. <br>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Required permission</i>: resource=<b>"ADMIN:NAMESPACE"</b>, action=1 <b>(CREATE)</b></li><li><i>Action code</i>: 11301</li><li><i>Returns</i>: created namespace</li></ul>

put.description: Update my profile.<br>Updates user profile in the target namespace (namespace in the path). If token's namespace doesn't match the target namespace, the service automatically maps the token's user ID into the user ID in the target namespace. The endpoint returns the updated user profile on a successful call.<br>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Required permission</i>: resource=<b>"NAMESPACE:{namespace}:PROFILE"</b>, action=4 <b>(UPDATE)</b></li><li><i>Action code</i>: 11402</li><li><i>Returns</i>: user profile</li><li><i>Path's namespace</i> : <ul><li>can be filled with <b>publisher namespace</b> in order to update <b>publisher user profile</b></li><li>can be filled with <b>game namespace</b> in order to update <b>game user profile</b></li></ul></li><li><i>Language</i> : allowed format: en, en-US</li><li><i>Timezone</i> : IANA time zone, e.g. Asia/Shanghai</li></ul>

post.description: This API is used to report a game user.<p>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Required permission</i>: resource="NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:ACTION", action=1 (CREATE)</li></ul>

parameters.description: namespace, only accept alphabet and numeric
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.description: reporter user id, should follow UUID version 4 without hyphen
parameters.name: userId

post.description: Generate an upload URL for user content. It's valid for 10 minutes.<br/>There are 2 kinds of storage limitation per user : maximum file count and maximum file size.<br/>The threshold of those limitations is different between upload category that is used.<br/>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Required permission</i>: resource = <b>"NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:FILEUPLOAD"</b>, action=1 <b>(CREATE)</b></li><li><i>Action code</i>: 11102</li><li><i>Default maximum file count per user</i>: 10 files</li><li><i>Default maximum file size per user</i>: 104857600 bytes</li><li><i>Returns</i>: URL data</li></ul>

parameters.description: namespace, only accept alphabet and numeric
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.description: user's id, should follow UUID version 4 without hyphen
parameters.name: userId

parameters.description: one of the these types: jpeg, jpg, png, bmp, gif, mp3, bin, webp
parameters.name: fileType

parameters.description: Upload category. Supported categories: default, reporting
parameters.name: category

400.description:
errorCodeerrorMessage
20002validation error
11121Unable to {action}: category {category} is not valid
11131Unable to {action}: File type is not supported

409.description:
errorCodeerrorMessage
11132Unable to {action}: file storage exceed limitation, user ID: {userId}, namespace: {namespace}

post.summary: Generate Upload URL For User Content
